   16: 
   17: -module(privacy_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -define(SLEEP_TIME, 50).
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Suite configuration
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [{group, management},
   32:      {group, blocking},
   33:      {group, allowing}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{management, [sequence], management_test_cases()},
   38:      {blocking, [sequence], blocking_test_cases()},
   39:      {allowing, [sequence], allowing_test_cases()}
   40:     ].
   41: management_test_cases() ->
   42:     [get_all_lists,
   43:      get_existing_list,
   44:      get_many_lists,
   45:      get_nonexistent_list,
   46:      set_list,
   47:      activate,
   48:      activate_nonexistent,
   49:      deactivate,
   50:      default,
   51:      %default_conflict,  % fails, as of bug #7073
   52:      default_nonexistent,
   53:      no_default,
   54:      remove_list,
   55:      get_all_lists_with_active
   56:      %get_all_lists_with_default
   57:      % not implemented (see testcase)
   58:     ].
   59: 
   60: blocking_test_cases() ->
   61:     [block_jid_message,
   62:      block_group_message,
   63:      block_subscription_message,
   64:      block_all_message,
   65:      block_jid_presence_in,
   66:      block_jid_presence_out,
   67:      block_jid_iq,
   68:      block_jid_all,
   69:      block_jid_message_but_not_presence
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: allowing_test_cases() ->
   73:     [allow_subscription_to_from_message,
   74:      allow_subscription_both_message].
   75: 
   76: 
   77: suite() ->
   78:     escalus:suite().
   79: 
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: %% Init & teardown
   82: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   83: 
   84: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     [{escalus_no_stanzas_after_story, true} |
   86:      escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   87: 
   88: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   89:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   90: 
   91: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   92:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   93: 
   94: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   95:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   96: 
   97: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   98:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   99: 
  100: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  101:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  102: 
  103: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  104: %% Tests
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: 
  107: %% TODO:
  108: %% x get all privacy lists
  109: %% x get single privacy list
  110: %%   x that exists
  111: %%   x that doesn't exist (ensure server returns item-not-found)
  112: %%   x request more than one at a time (ensure server returns bad-request)
  113: %% x set new/edit privacy list (ensure server pushes notifications
  114: %%   to all resources)
  115: %% - remove existing list
  116: %%   x remove existing list (ensure server push)
  117: %%   - remove, but check conflict case
  118: %% x manage active list(s)
  119: %%   x activate
  120: %%   x activate nonexistent (ensure item-not-found)
  121: %%   x deactivate by sending empty <active />
  122: %% - manage default list
  123: %%   x set default
  124: %%   - set default, but check the conflict case, i.e.:
  125: %%     "Client attempts to change the default list but that list is in use
  126: %%     by another resource",
  127: %%     !!! ejabberd doesn't support this, bug filed (#7073)
  128: %%   x set nonexistent default list
  129: %%   x use domain's routing, i.e. no default list -> send empty <default />
  130: %%   - set no default list, but check conflict case,
  131: %%     when a resource currently uses the default list
  132: %%
  133: %% TODO later:
  134: %% - big picture:
  135: %%   - blocking can be done on jids, roster groups,
  136: %%     subscription type or globally
  137: %%   - a blocking rule may block one or more of {message, presence-in,
  138: %%     presence-out, iqs} by specifying these as children to the list item
  139: %%     or block all of them, when the item has no children
  140: %% - blocking: messages, presence (in/out), iqs, all
  141: 
  142: get_all_lists(Config) ->
  143:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  144: 
  145:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  146:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  147: 
  148:         end).
  149: 
  150: get_all_lists_with_active(Config) ->
  151:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  152: 
  153:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  154: 
  155:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  156:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result_with_active, [<<"deny_bob">>],
  157:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  158: 
  159:         end).
  160: 
  161: %% Black box testing showed that this feature is not implemented,
  162: %% i.e. the <default /> element is never returned by ejabberd.
  163: %% However, I'm not 100% sure, as I didn't look inside the source.
  164: get_all_lists_with_default(Config) ->
  165:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  166: 
  167:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  168:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"allow_bob">>),
  169: 
  170:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_all()),
  171:         escalus:assert(is_privacy_result_with_default,
  172:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  173: 
  174:         end).
  175: 
  176: get_nonexistent_list(Config) ->
  177:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  178: 
  179:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  180:             escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"public">>])),
  181:         escalus_assert:is_privacy_list_nonexistent_error(
  182:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  183: 
  184:         end).
  185: 
  186: get_many_lists(Config) ->
  187:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  188: 
  189:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"public">>, <<"private">>]),
  190:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  191:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  192:         escalus_assert:is_error(Response, <<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>)
  193: 
  194:         end).
  195: 
  196: get_existing_list(Config) ->
  197:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  198: 
  199:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  200: 
  201:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"deny_bob">>])),
  202:         Response = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  203: 
  204:         <<"deny_bob">> = exml_query:path(Response, [{element, <<"query">>},
  205:                                                     {element, <<"list">>},
  206:                                                     {attr, <<"name">>}])
  207: 
  208:         end).
  209: 
  210: activate(Config) ->
  211:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  212: 
  213:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  214: 
  215:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_bob">>),
  216:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  217: 
  218:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  219:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  220: 
  221:         end).
  222: 
  223: activate_nonexistent(Config) ->
  224:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  225: 
  226:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"some_list">>),
  227:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  228: 
  229:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  230:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>], Response)
  231: 
  232:         end).
  233: 
  234: deactivate(Config) ->
  235:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  236: 
  237:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_deactivate(),
  238:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  239: 
  240:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  241:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  242: 
  243:         end).
  244: 
  245: default(Config) ->
  246:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  247: 
  248:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  249: 
  250:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"deny_bob">>),
  251:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  252: 
  253:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  254:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  255: 
  256:         end).
  257: 
  258: default_conflict(Config) ->
  259:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Alice2, _Bob) ->
  260: 
  261:         %% testcase setup
  262:         %% setup list on server
  263:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  264:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"allow_bob">>),
  265:         %% skip responses
  266:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 4),
  267:         %% make a default list for Alice2
  268:         R1 = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(Alice2, <<"deny_bob">>),
  269:         escalus_client:send(Alice2, R1),
  270:         escalus:assert_many([is_privacy_set, is_privacy_set, is_iq_result],
  271:                             escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3)),
  272:         %% setup done
  273: 
  274:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"allow_bob">>),
  275:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  276: 
  277:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  278:         %% TODO: should fail on this (result) and receive error
  279:         %%       this is a bug and was filed to the esl redmine as Bug #7073
  280:         %true = exmpp_iq:is_result(Response),
  281:         %% but this should pass just fine
  282:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"conflict">>], Response)
  283: 
  284:         end).
  285: 
  286: default_nonexistent(Config) ->
  287:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  288: 
  289:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_default(<<"some_list">>),
  290:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  291: 
  292:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  293:         escalus_assert:is_error(Response, <<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>)
  294: 
  295:         end).
  296: 
  297: no_default(Config) ->
  298:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  299: 
  300:         Request = escalus_stanza:privacy_no_default(),
  301:         escalus_client:send(Alice, Request),
  302: 
  303:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  304:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Response)
  305: 
  306:         end).
  307: 
  308: set_list(Config) ->
  309:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 3}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Alice2, Alice3, _Bob) ->
  310: 
  311:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  312: 
  313:         %% Verify that original Alice gets iq result and notification.
  314:         %% It's a bit quirky as these come in undefined order
  315:         %% (actually, they always came with 'push' first and then 'result',
  316:         %% but I suppose it's not mandatory).
  317:         AliceResponses = escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  318:         escalus:assert_many([
  319:             fun escalus_pred:is_iq_result/1,
  320:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1
  321:         ], AliceResponses),
  322: 
  323:         %% Verify that other resources also get the push.
  324:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  325:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2)),
  326:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  327:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice3))
  328: 
  329:         %% All in all, the spec requires the resources to reply
  330:         %% (as to every iq), but it's omitted here.
  331: 
  332:         end).
  333: 
  334: remove_list(Config) ->
  335:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  336: 
  337:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  338: 
  339:         %% These are the pushed notification and iq result.
  340:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  341: 
  342:         %% Request list deletion by sending an empty list.
  343:         RemoveRequest = escalus_stanza:privacy_set_list(
  344:                 escalus_stanza:privacy_list(<<"someList">>, [])),
  345:         escalus_client:send(Alice, RemoveRequest),
  346: 
  347:         %% These too are the pushed notification and iq result.
  348:         escalus:assert_many([
  349:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  350:             is_iq_result
  351:         ], escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  352: 
  353:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  354:             escalus_stanza:privacy_get_lists([<<"someList">>])),
  355: 
  356:         %% Finally ensure that the list doesn't exist anymore.
  357:         escalus_assert:is_privacy_list_nonexistent_error(
  358:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  359: 
  360:         end).
  361: 
  362: block_jid_message(Config) ->
  363:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  364: 
  365:         %% Alice should receive message
  366:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  367:             escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi! What's your name?">>)),
  368:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi! What's your name?">>,
  369:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  370: 
  371:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  372:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_message">>),
  373: 
  374:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  375:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  376:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  377:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  378: 
  379:         end).
  380: 
  381: block_group_message(Config) ->
  382:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  383: 
  384:         %% Alice should receive message
  385:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  386:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  387:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  388: 
  389:         %% add Bob to Alices' group 'ignored'
  390:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, [<<"ignored">>], <<"Ugly Bastard">>),
  391: 
  392:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  393:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_group_message">>),
  394: 
  395:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  396:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, blocked group!">>)),
  397:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  398:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  399: 
  400:         end).
  401: 
  402: block_subscription_message(Config) ->
  403:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  404: 
  405:         %% Alice should receive message
  406:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  407:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  408:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  409: 
  410:         %% Alice sends unsubscribe
  411:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  412:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"unsubscribe">>)),
  413: 
  414:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  415:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_unsubscribed_message">>),
  416: 
  417:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  418:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  419:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  420:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  421: 
  422:         end).
  423: 
  424: allow_subscription_to_from_message(Config) ->
  425:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  426:         %% deny all message but not from subscribed "to"
  427:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_all_message_but_subscription_to">>),
  428: 
  429:         %% deny all message but not from subscribed "from"
  430:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Bob, <<"deny_all_message_but_subscription_from">>),
  431: 
  432:         %% Bob and Alice cannot sent to each other now
  433:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>)),
  434:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>)),
  435: 
  436:         ct:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  437:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  438:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  439: 
  440:         %% Alice subscribes to Bob
  441:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  442:                             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  443:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  444:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  445: 
  446:         %% Bob accepts Alice
  447:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  448:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  449:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
  450: 
  451:         %% Now Alice is subscirbed "to" Bob
  452:         %% And Bob is subscribed "from" Alice
  453: 
  454:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>)),
  455:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>,
  456:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  457: 
  458:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>)),
  459:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>,
  460:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  461: 
  462:     end).
  463: 
  464: 
  465: allow_subscription_both_message(Config) ->
  466:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  467: 
  468:         [{_, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users([bob]),
  469:         {ok, Bob, _Spec2, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  470:         %escalus_story:send_initial_presence(Alice),
  471:         escalus_story:send_initial_presence(Bob),
  472:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  473:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  474:         %% deny all message but not from subscribed "to"
  475:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_all_message_but_subscription_both">>),
  476: 
  477:         %% deny all message but not from subscribed "from"
  478:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Bob, <<"deny_all_message_but_subscription_both">>),
  479: 
  480:         %% Bob and Alice cannot sent to each other now
  481:         %% Even though they are in subscription "to" and "from" respectively
  482:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>)),
  483:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, <<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>)),
  484: 
  485:         ct:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  486:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  487:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  488: 
  489:         %% Alice subscribes to Bob
  490:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  491:                             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribe">>)),
  492:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  493:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  494: 
  495:         %% Bob accepts Alice
  496:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribed">>)),
  497:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  498:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  499: 
  500:         %% Now their subscription is in state "both"
  501:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>)),
  502:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi, Alice XYZ!">>,
  503:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  504: 
  505:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, <<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>)),
  506:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi, Bob XYZ!">>,
  507:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  508: 
  509:     end).
  510: 
  511: block_all_message(Config) ->
  512:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  513: 
  514:         %% Alice should receive message
  515:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  516:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>,
  517:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  518: 
  519:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  520:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_all_message">>),
  521: 
  522:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  523:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  524:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  525:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  526: 
  527:         end).
  528: 
  529: block_jid_presence_in(Config) ->
  530:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  531: 
  532:         %% Alice should receive presence in
  533:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  534:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  535:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  536:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  537:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Bob, Received),
  538: 
  539:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_presence_in">>),
  540: 
  541:         %% Alice should NOT receive presence in
  542:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  543:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  544:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  545:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  546: 
  547:         end).
  548: 
  549: block_jid_presence_out(Config) ->
  550:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  551: 
  552:         %% Bob should receive presence in
  553:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  554:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  555:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  556:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  557:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Alice, Received),
  558: 
  559:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_presence_out">>),
  560: 
  561:         %% Bob should NOT receive presence in
  562:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  563:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  564: 
  565:         %% Alice gets an error back from mod_privacy
  566:         Presence = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  567:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"error">>], Presence),
  568: 
  569:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  570:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
  571: 
  572:         end).
  573: 
  574: block_jid_iq(Config) ->
  575:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  576: 
  577:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_localhost_iq">>),
  578:         %% activate it
  579:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  580:             escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_localhost_iq">>)),
  581:         %% From now on no iq replies should reach Alice.
  582:         %% That's also the reason why we couldn't use
  583:         %% the privacy_helper:set_and_activate helper - it waits for all replies.
  584: 
  585:         %% Just set the toy list and ensure that only
  586:         %% the notification push comes back.
  587:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  588:         Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  589:         escalus:assert(fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1, Response),
  590:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  591:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  592: 
  593:         end).
  594: 
  595: block_jid_all(Config) ->
  596:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  597: 
  598:         privacy_helper:set_list(Alice, <<"deny_jid_all">>),
  599: 
  600:         %% Alice blocks Bob
  601:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  602:             escalus_stanza:privacy_activate(<<"deny_jid_all">>)),
  603:         %% IQ response is blocked;
  604:         %% do magic wait for the request to take effect
  605:         timer:sleep(200),
  606: 
  607:         %% From now on nothing whatsoever sent by Bob should reach Alice.
  608: 
  609:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  610:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  611: 
  612:         %% Alice should NOT receive presence-in from Bob
  613:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  614:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"available">>)),
  615: 
  616:         %% Bob should NOT receive presence-in from Alice
  617:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  618:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  619: 
  620:         %% Just set the toy list and ensure that only
  621:         %% the notification push comes back.
  622:         privacy_helper:send_set_list(Alice, <<"deny_bob">>),
  623: 
  624:         %% verify
  625:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  626:         %% ...that nothing reached Bob
  627:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  628:         %% ...that Alice got exactly two responses
  629:         Responses = escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  630:         %% one of which is a push and the other a presence error
  631:         escalus:assert_many([
  632:             fun privacy_helper:is_privacy_list_push/1,
  633:             fun privacy_helper:is_presence_error/1
  634:         ], Responses),
  635:         %% and Alice didn't get anything else
  636:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  637: 
  638:         end).
  639: 
  640: block_jid_message_but_not_presence(Config) ->
  641:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  642: 
  643:         %% Alice should receive message
  644:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  645:             escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi! What's your name?">>)),
  646:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi! What's your name?">>,
  647:             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  648: 
  649:         %% set the list on server and make it active
  650:         privacy_helper:set_and_activate(Alice, <<"deny_bob_message">>),
  651: 
  652:         %% Alice should NOT receive message
  653:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  654:         timer:sleep(?SLEEP_TIME),
  655:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  656: 
  657:         %% ...but should receive presence in
  658:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  659:             escalus_stanza:presence_direct(Alice, <<"available">>)),
  660:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  661:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  662:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Bob, Received)
  663: 
  664:         end).
  665: 
  666: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  667: %% Helpers
  668: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  669: 
  670: add_sample_contact(Who, Whom, Groups, Nick) ->
  671:     escalus_client:send(Who,
  672:                         escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Whom,
  673:                                                           Groups,
  674:                                                           Nick)),
  675:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Who),
  676:     escalus_assert:is_roster_set(Received),
  677:     escalus_client:send(Who, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  678:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Who)).
